name: Tavern Dartboard: "Valid Throw"
description: A dartboard evenly divided into blue and white scoring zones that can be found at The Flagship in Nasha Town. It supports a variety of different games.\nIt is said that the dartboards in the tavern are made from softer-than-usual wood. After all, many of the tavern's patrons are habitually tipsy and unable to adequately control the force of their throws. Given that darts can bounce back at the player or at others when thrown with excessive force, it was determined that sacrificing some durability for a material less susceptible to ricochets would be the wiser choice...
